title: Front End Happy Hour
welcome: Welcome to the Front End Happy Hour podcast!
desc: A software engineering podcast featuring a panel of Software Engineers from Netflix, Twitch, & Atlassian talking over drinks about Frontend, JavaScript, and career development.
tagline: A software engineering podcast featuring a panel of Software Engineers from Netflix, Twitch, & Atlassian talking over drinks about Frontend, JavaScript, and career development.
about:
Front End Happy Hour is a software engineering podcast that first started in February 2016. The podcast consists of a regular group of panelists from Silicon Valley companies, Netflix, Twitch, Atlassian, Evernote, and LinkedIn who are often joined by guests that get together over drinks to discuss a variety of topics for frontend, JavaScript, software engineerning, and career development.

The Front End Happy Hour podcast is recorded on a regularÂ basis and releases new episodes on a bi-weekly basis.
subscribe: The Front End Happy Hour podcast is available on all the great podcast services you like to listen to your podcasts on. Make sure to subscribe to get the latest episodes!
footer: Made with _LOVE_ by Front End Happy Hour
